evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: This Court has jurisdiction pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1331. Plaintiffs’ challenge to the 2025 Rule is reviewable under the Administrative Procedure Act, 5 U.S.C. § 701 et seq.

extracted.value: Administrative Procedure Act (5 U.S.C. § 701 et seq.)
